reviewText: watched it he like it and will watch it over and over again  love trains trains any train dvd !

My girls love Chuggington. This DVD contains six episodes from the Disney Jr. cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Rescue at Rocky Ridge
2. Wilson's Forest Flare
3. Skylar's Squad
4. Brewster's Crane Training
5. Wobbly Wheels
6. Wilson's Paper Trail

It is great to see a new Chuggington DVD.  My son loves the show and we enjoyed the episodes.  They chuggers are "growing up" and it is exciting to see Chuggington show that is a part of life too.  Entertains my little man- and it a positive show vs some of the Nickelodeon shows that are out there.

First off I like Chugginton and I think it's a nice kids show, but the DVD is just two separate episodes merged together to form this 'special' and compare it to the ones from Thomas & Friends, the Thomas ones kept it into one entity and makes it feel like a DVD special. But it has a great story some excellent morals in a visual standpoint as well so it's not bad.
I love that my grand children enjoy this whole series of videos.  Very entertaining and wholesome for the little ones.
Kids are obsessed with these characters.
my son LOVES chuggington. he loves it so much the DVD doesn't play all the way through anymore. "i do it" you know three year olds.
Kept my 3 year old grandson entertained ! He watched them over and over again. Would definitely recommend these for little train lovers!!!

My 3 and 5 year old boys love Chugginton and watch these videos all the time!  They always want to watch these train videos, they are very entertaining.  They like Chugginton more than Thomas so we just watch these now!
